iss.description: The Issuer of the JWT; it MUST be set to the URI of the Wallet Provider

sub.description: The Subject of the JWT; it MUST be set to the thumbprint of the jwk of the Wallet Instance for which the attestation is being issued, in base64url encoded

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the JWT was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

exp.description: The UNIX Timestamp after which the JWT expire

nbf.description: The UNIX Timestamp before which the JWT must not be accepted for processing

aal.description: The authentication level of the Wallet Instance

cnf.description: Object containing the public key of the Wallet Instance necessary for the Holder Key Binding

jwk.description: The public key of the Wallet Instance (in JWK format) necessary for the Holder Key Binding

crv.description: The cryptographic curve used with the key. Values defined by this specification are 'P-256', 'P-384' and 'P-521'

kty.description: The cryptographic algorithm family used with the key, such as 'RSA' or 'EC'

x.description: The x coordinate for the elliptic curve point. It is represented as the base64url encoding of the coordinate's big endian representation

y.description: The y coordinate for the elliptic curve point. It is represented as the base64url encoding of the coordinate's big endian representation

kid.description: An identifier that refers to the public key of the Wallet Instance. This is used, for instance, to choose among a set of keys within a JWK Set
